findings.title: approve
findings.description: External approve function has no access control.

findings.title: Insecure Transfer Functions
findings.description: Multiple private transfer functions (_tokenTransfer, _transferStandard, _transferToExcluded, _transferFromExcluded, _transferBothExcluded) and one public function (transferToAddressETH) have been identified with potential security risks.

findings.title: transferFrom
findings.description: Private function _transferFromExcluded found

findings.title: Unprotected permit Function
findings.description: The permit function is marked as external and does not have any access modifiers, making it vulnerable to unauthorized calls.

findings.title: Burn Functionality
findings.description: The burn functionality can be exploited to drain the contract's liquidity.

findings.title: Swap Function Vulnerability
findings.description: Potential vulnerability found in swap functions, including swapExactTokensForTokensSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens, swapExactETHForTokensSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens, and swapExactTokensForETHSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens.

findings.title: Skim
findings.description: N/A

findings.title: Reentrancy Vulnerability in sync Function
findings.description: The sync function has a reentrancy vulnerability due to the external call.

findings.title: Unprotected Initialize Function
findings.description: The initialize function does not have any access modifiers or restrictions, making it vulnerable to unauthorized calls.

findings.title: _tokenTransfer
findings.description: Private function without further information

findings.title: _transferStandard
findings.description: Private function without further details

findings.title: _transferToExcluded
findings.description: Private function _transferToExcluded has been identified as a potential vulnerability.

findings.title: _transferFromExcluded
findings.description: Private function _transferFromExcluded has a potential vulnerability.

findings.title: _transferBothExcluded
findings.description: Private function _transferBothExcluded has been identified as a potential vulnerability.

findings.title: _reflectFee
findings.description: Private function _reflectFee has been identified.

findings.title: _takeLiquidity
findings.description: N/A

findings.title: removeAllFee
findings.description: Potential vulnerability in removeAllFee function

findings.title: restoreAllFee
findings.description: N/A

findings.title: excludeFromFee
findings.description: The excludeFromFee function has a potential vulnerability.

findings.title: includeInFee
findings.description: The includeInFee function has a potential vulnerability due to its public accessibility and onlyOwner modifier.

findings.title: setTaxFeePercent
findings.description: External function setTaxFeePercent has been identified as a potential vulnerability.

findings.title: Unprotected Function: setLiqMarketingPercent
findings.description: The function setLiqMarketingPercent has been declared as External and can be called by anyone, potentially allowing unauthorized users to modify the liq marketing percent.

findings.title: setMaxTxAmount
findings.description: External function setMaxTxAmount has onlyOwner access control

findings.title: setDivisor
findings.description: N/A

findings.title: setNumTokensSellToAddToLiquidity
findings.description: The setNumTokensSellToAddToLiquidity function has a potential vulnerability due to its external access and onlyOwner modifier.

findings.title: setMarketingAddress
findings.description: The setMarketingAddress function has an external access modifier and can only be called by the owner.

findings.description: N/A

findings.description: N/A
